The LP system for Diamond and Masters is extremely garbage... Even if you manage to get an 80% winrate and Masters MMR while being D3 you still get garbage like +15 LP and -20 LP.
This is why so many people just get Diamond and don't bother playing for anything higher.
That is brutal :(

LP gain in Dia is trash.
I just joined Dia. When I was Plat 1 I got around 20 LP. In Dia4 it's 15 LP (-20 per lose). 
I had 8 games in Dia now and won 6 of them. At my last game i got only 14 points.

Yep. Players like you get punished because Riot made a huge fucking mistake this ranked season.

Did you placement a role you don't play/play some fill games with Positional ranking?

When they merged ranks, your overall MMR rating became an average of all unlocked ranks....

So if you are D IV Mid/Support, but a Gold I Top, it's likely your MMR is Plat IV while your Rank is D IV.
It kept track of the amount of games played in each role. If you're D IV mid with 500 games and Gold I top with 12 games, your MMR will be much clsoer to your mid MMR.
Not what I experienced. Only had 23 Bot games and 26 Top games out of 300 when, and my other roles were 65-70%. Yet those MMR's in Top/Bot absolutely destroyed my MMR overall.
Revert the LP nerf riot.
Its funny how riot doesnt explain their MMR in details. Its almost like they dont want us to know how it works so we dont abuse their little system of determining who gets to go up.
